text: Basi jwagakwanisye kagumbidwe kakwe kuwa mawunde nsano nagawili mâ€™mowa gawili. Ni jwalimanyisye liwunde lililyose masengo gakwe. Ni twalisalalisye liwunde lya duniya ni nyali (ndondwa) ni kuligosa (nasyo ndondwasyo pakugasomela mashetani ndema jagakusaka kuja kupikanila malowe kwinani). Walakweo ni mpango wa (Allah) Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwakumanyilila nnope
